articles.title: As the day unfolded: Scott Morrison aims for full reopening of Australian economy by July, global COVID-19 cases surpass 4 million as Australian death toll stands at 97 - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: If you suspect you or a family member has coronavirus you should call (not visit) your GP or ring the national Coronavirus Health Information Hotline on 1800 020 080.
articles.content:
